titleInfo.title: Max Stein Peddling Pineapples from his Wagon

physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "# 386 Max Stein Peddling Pineapples in Pueblo c. 1910." Handwritten on back of one photograph: "Max Stein with his fruit wagon, c. 1910. Pueblo Co., Donor Mrs. Ruth Stein, #386, MMJ2." Handwritten on back of one photograph: "#386 Max Stein peddling pineapple in Pueblo."

mods.abstract: Max Stein stands in front of his horse-drawn fruit wagon on a street in Pueblo, Colorado with an unidentified man holding pineapples. Stein also served as a mounted policeman in Pueblo at the turn of the century.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 127.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
